0.1.0.en: Automatic device discovery, Quatt sensor value readings

0.2.0.en: Added power consumption and thermal output power

1.1.0.en: Add computed sensor values for COP and water temperature delta

1.1.1.en: fix: crash due to toString on undefined

1.1.2.en: fix: don't crash when CicHeatpump is undefined

1.1.3.en: Ensure resilience to Quatt CiC data being null

1.1.4.en: Ensure resilience to Quatt CiC unexpected values

1.2.0.en: Use new flow rate property; convert control mode types

1.2.2.en: Replace ARP MAC lookup with Quatt hostname

1.3.0.en: Add manual IP option; add auto-reconnect upon IP change; add Homey insights; better localization; better error handling and general overall improvements
